intro.description: Add an initial requirement on a unit or a capability, and then add additional requirements.

item.title: Add the first requirement.
item.description: Add the first requirement using a template.

subitem.label: Place the caret inside the body of the unit where you want to add a requirement.
Select 'RequiresUnit" - for a dependency on another unit, or 'RequiresCapability' for a dependency on a capability provided by some unit.

Modify the template variables; 'nameSpace' (if a capability requirement was used), 'name' (the name of the unit or capability), 'versionRange' the version (or range) of the unit or capability. Press TAB to move between variables until template is finished.

item.title: Add additional requirements
item.description: Add any additional requirements using a template.

subitem.label: Separate the new requirement from the previous by typing a comma ','
With caret positioned after the comma, press CTRL+space
Modify the template variables (as described in the 'Add the first requirement' step.
